abstract: Fortinet shares soared following a report that I.B.M. was interested in it, but the stock gave back much of its gains when the network security company said it was not in acquisition talks.
snippet: Fortinet shares soared following a report that I.B.M. was interested in it, but the stock gave back much of its gains when the network security company said it was not in acquisition talks.
lead_paragraph: 4:25 p.m. | Updated After its shares climbed as much as 22 percent on Monday following a report that I.B.M. was interested in a takeover, the network security company Fortinet said Monday afternoon that no deal was in the works.

headline.main: Fortinet’s Shares Take Wild Ride on Deal/No Deal
